thread.title: 8 easy vegan bowls that’ll add some color to your meals
thread.title_full: 8 easy vegan bowls that’ll add some color to your meals

author: Rachel Charlene Lewis
title: 8 easy vegan bowls that’ll add some color to your meals
text:
8 easy vegan bowls that’ll add some color to your meals We love trying new, healthy meals, so when we learned about vegan bowls, we had to look up some recipes! And there are actually *so* many vegan bowl recipes , whether you like fruit-filled smoothie bowls or want something a little closer to comfort food. These vegan recipes are so delicious you won’t even remember they’re vegan, and they’re so bright and colorful (naturally!) that you know they’re nutritious AF.
So what are some of our fave vegan bowls?
1. This rice bowl with avocado, peas, pak choi and mushrooms A photo posted by xenia | vegan (@healthyhandsomelife) on Jan 5, 2017 at 9:42am PST 
2. This chocolate oatmeal topped with banana, frozen raspberries, and oat cereal A photo posted by Vera (@datesandfigs) on Jan 5, 2017 at 2:49am PST 
3. This dragon fruit smoothie bowl A photo posted by THRIVE Magazine: VEGAN (@thrivemags) on Jan 7, 2017 at 8:22am PST 
4. This bowl with quinoa, scrambled tofu, hash browns, and sautéed veggies A photo posted by Jessॐ | Montreal (@choosingchia) on Jan 4, 2017 at 5:27am PST 
5. This pasta bowl with grilled eggplant, sautéed black beans, zucchini and tomato stew, and piccolo cherry tomatoes A photo posted by Sómi | Vegan since April 2016 (@veganbysomi) on Jan 6, 2017 at 2:22am PST 
6. This purple bowl with loads of fancy fruits A photo posted by Connie Tan :)) (@rememberinggg) on Jan 7, 2017 at 5:32pm PST 
7. This chocolate pudding oats with banana, raspberries and some coconut syrup on top A photo posted by Vera (@datesandfigs) on Jan 3, 2017 at 1:35pm PST 
8. This veggie bowl with sprouted lentils, organic veggies, fresh corn and wasabi sesame seeds A photo posted by Artsy_brunette (@effivlass) on Jan 7, 2017 at 3:30pm PST 
We hope you have so much fun giving these easy vegan bowls a shot!
